name: Crazy Taxi Driver Simulator 3D - real free yellow cab racing sim mania game
name_original: Crazy Taxi Driver Simulator 3D - real free yellow cab racing sim mania game
description:
Welcome to Crazy Taxi Driver Simulator 3D 2016
Are you fan of playing taxi driving games, taxi car games, taxi mission games, taxi parking games? If yes then this game is the thing you have been waiting for. Taxi driver simulator 2016 tells the secret about driving and parking. In this game you need to find and take your cab near the passengers by following the guiding on screen map to catch them up and drop them to their desired destination by parking to right spot in time. In this taxi driver super fun simulator game you are going to experience what is duty taxi driver in the beautifully designed 3d city environment.

Crazy Taxi Driver Simulator 3D 2016
- Taxi driver - drive passengers around the city
- Taxi parking - park your taxi
- City - drive passengers through heavy city traffic
- Best in the city taxi car driving games category
- Beautiful city environment and game graphics
- Amazing MODERN CITY TAXI SIMULATION Physics

Fasten your seat belt and get ready for the thrilling drive as a City Taxi Driver. Taxi driving gets more exciting with this all new game. Crazy Taxi Driver is new free cool game in Simulation category. You often use a taxi but never was on a taxi driver seat? if you like a crazy taxi driving hurry up just jump into the game and enjoy crazy driving and can improve your driving skills for driving luxury and latest taxis. Your taxi. Your rules. Your Speed, drift and whip around corners, weave through traffic, up ramps and into the air. So it is your chance to become a real taxi driver in a big city! Drive as fast as you can. Do all what you want in this game? Ever loved to play taxi mission games, taxi parking games, taxi games 2016? Then this is the right fit for you.
